content: @nikomatsakis i finally got lolbench together enough to blog about and invite contribs https://blog.anp.lol/rust/2018/09/29/lolbench/
@Adam Perry cool, I'll check that out!

@Adam Perry if we did want contributors to appear, and just in general, maybe we should try to make it more "officially" part of rust? I'm not even sure where the repo is, but e.g. we could create a "lolbench working group" etc here
https://github.com/anp/lolbench - i’d be very happy to see a wg spin up and could probably carve some time out for mentoring or w/e
@pnkfelix i think i fixed the css issue https://github.com/anp/lolbench/commit/ebda5151db6f7e7b2c6003c9e8971d12c08a49eb, will see in a bit once deploys go out
also @nikomatsakis i'd be delighted to get some help finding contributors
huzzah lolbench is le broked bc i let the hacking repo grow too large and i missed the github emails warning me they were shutting the repo off
the bots are still accumulating data but they aren’t pushing it anywhere
i think i’ll spend a couple of hours to find a different data sync mechanism than github
